references: H. S. M. Coxeter, Introduction to Geometry, Second Edition, Wiley Classics Library Edition Published 1989, p. 172.
links: Ivan Panchenko, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1, 1).
mathematica: RecurrenceTable[{a[0] == 2, a[1] == 7, a[n] == a[n - 1] + a[n - 2]}, a, {n, 0, 40}] (* _Bruno Berselli_, Mar 12 2015 *)
prog: (MAGMA) a0:=2; a1:=7; [GeneralizedFibonacciNumber(a0, a1, n): n in [0..40]]; // _Bruno Berselli_, Feb 12 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
